segments.text: Now let's begin the class . Who is on duty today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Please come to the front to have five minutes â€™ free talk in English . Very well ! Whose turn is it to have a free talk ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's me , sir . But I am sorry I have forgotten to prepare for it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well . Don't forget to perform your duty next time , ok ? Now , let's start our lesson .
segments.speaker: S1
